function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Weekly forecasts of total deaths and hospitalization for the USA","Impact":"Misinterpretation of forecasts could lead to complacency or panic, affecting public health interventions.","Mitigation":"Clear communication on the limitations and uncertainties of the forecasts, use of multiple modeling groups for validation.","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, transparent reporting methods.","People":"General public, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Forecasting agencies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Digital contact tracing systems","Impact":"Privacy concerns, potential misuse of personal data, reliance on technology for public health measures.","Mitigation":"Privacy-focused design, transparency in data collection and storage, user consent and control over data sharing.","Technologies":"Bluetooth, GPS, encryption, decentralized log processing.","People":"General public, app developers, public health authorities","Owner":"App developers, public health authorities"}]}
